item.title: Tidy Forecasting: How to Visualize Time Series
item.description: 1. Set Up 1.1 Introduction There are a number of forecasting packages written in R to choose from, each with their own pros and cons. For almost a decade, the forecast library from the fpp2 forecasting framework has been a major force in the time series world. However, within the last year or so an official update has been released. This new fpp3 framework utilizes a package called fable that follows tidy methodology as opposed to using base R code.
